title: Yaku Aguamundi
description: An immersive 340 degrees mapping with 3D animated submarine animals endemic to Ecuador. I was in charge of the cinematography, rendering and mapping for the experience.

title: Nestle Hawkeye Game
description: A small game for Nestle about tennis. The player can select up to three hawkeye moments and guess if it was right or wrong. Design by client. Developed for Atiko7.

title: BDP Videoplayers
description: A dynamic video player with categories developed for OnSignTV a CMS platform. For a videowall of eight screens (4*2) where two people can interact at a time browsing and playing video. Also on a videowall of four screens (2*2) for one user only. Design by client. Developed for Nido Interactive.

title: MuNa Museum
description: Different applications for the National Museums. Developed for multitouch devices. I worked on the functionality of a game about creating collections, programming the museum map, and designed and programmed two timelines, one included a music player. Developed for Nido Interactive

title: Distrito
description: Interactive webpage with 2D sprites that simulate a 3D appearence. It includes a json file to dynamically add information for different interactive buildings. Developed for Atiko7.

title: MuPa Museum
description: The Pasillo Museum applications for searching, browsing by category, and playing music. Worked on the design and programming. The information is loaded through a external database. Assited on a Karaoke machine controled by a jukebox. We rewired the buttons with an arduino to trigger differente karaoke songs. Developed for Nido Interactive.

title: Feminicidios Ecuador
programs: Tui.chart, HTML, Java, CSS, Google Sheets
description: A dynamic webpage about femicide in Ecuador that is updated through a database in Google Sheets. The webpage has charts and a map added with Toast UI charts. Developed for Nido Interactive.

title: Killka and Brisa
description: A interactive toy for children to help them learn Braille. It gives feedback of 6 buttons positions connected to an Arduino through headphones to help memorize the Braille alphabet positions. Developed in college as a social project.

title: Multifest
description: Webpage developed for a VR video festival. It included ten different VR videos from around the world.

title: Invasion
description: A small 2D game with an original idea for a class project.
